alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 4:07AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Franklin County through 445 AM CDT... At 403 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bude, or 17 miles north of Liberty, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bude around 410 AM CDT. Little Springs around 420 AM CDT. Mccall Creek around 430 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Meadville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
